long_description: With a choice of 2 amber lenses that are great for overcast days, the Anon Helix Mirror snow goggles deliver contrast and definition so clouds won't overshadow your ability to really shred some lines. Silver Amber lens has a versatile amber tint with 35% visible light transmission (VLT) for good depth perception in low, flat to partly cloudy light; silver mirror cuts glare. Spare lens has an amber tint with 55% VLT, filtering out reflected blue light for superior contrast, shadow definition and depth perception. Antifog treatment and full-perimeter venting combat lens fogging. Dual-layer foam with moisture-wicking fleece supplies a comfortable, snug seal around your face. Tough thermoplastic polyurethane frame offers consistent flexibility in changing temperatures. The helmet-compatible design of the Anon Helix Mirror snow goggles fits smaller- to medium-size faces; goggles come with a microfiber storage bag.
short_description: With a choice of 2 amber lenses that are great for overcast days, the Anon Helix Mirror snow goggles deliver contrast and definition so clouds won't overshadow your ability to really shred some lines.
